## Presentation Pipeline — Layout Demo

This interactive demo shows how the **Presentation Pipeline (PPTX)** skill module automatically triggers 5 distinct PowerPoint layouts from structured QMD markup. The same source file produces both this HTML preview and a professionally styled `.pptx` file.

::: {.column-screen-inset}

```{=html}
<div style="position:relative; width:100%; max-width:1280px; margin:0 auto;">
  <iframe src="slides.html" width="100%" height="720" style="border:2px solid #0B1F33; border-radius:8px;" allowfullscreen></iframe>
</div>
```

:::

::: {.callout-tip}
## Navigation
Use arrow keys or click the edges to navigate. Press `F` for fullscreen. Press `Esc` for overview.
:::

### Layouts Demonstrated

| Slide | PowerPoint Layout | QMD Trigger |
|-------|-------------------|-------------|
| 1 | Title and Content | `## Heading` + bullet list |
| 2 | Two Content | `## Heading` + `:::: {.columns}` (text-only) |
| 3 | Comparison | `## Heading` + `:::: {.columns}` (text + image) |
| 4 | Content with Caption | `## Heading` + text + image (no columns) |
| 5 | Blank (Background) | `## {background-image="..."}` + `&nbsp;` |
| 6 | Title + Background | `## Title {background-image="..."}` + text |
| 7 | Two Content | Summary — layout trigger rules |

### Template Design

The dark "Pro" template uses a deep navy background (`#1A1A2E`) with high-contrast accent colors:

- **Titles**: Cyan `#00D2FF`
- **Body text**: Light gray `#E0E0E0`
- **Comparison headers**: Green `#00FF88`
- **Accent**: Purple `#7C4DFF`
